# Gamma Extension

Context window token analyzer & visualizer for Pi coding agent.

## Purpose
Analyzes and visualizes all token sources in the current context window.
Triggered via `/gamma` command, renders full-screen TUI dashboard.

## Token Categories
- system: Base system prompt, AGENTS.md, project context
- skills: Loaded SKILL.md files
- memory: Delta notes, episodic events, epsilon tasks
- tools: Tool schemas and descriptions
- user: User messages
- assistant: Assistant responses
- tool_io: Tool call arguments and results
- images: Image tokens

## Key Components
- Analyzer: Extracts token sources from SessionManager
- Tokenizer: js-tiktoken (cl100k_base) wrapper
- Dashboard: Full-screen TUI with charts

## Dependencies
- js-tiktoken: Pure JS tokenizer (no native deps)
- @mariozechner/pi-coding-agent: Pi extension API
- @mariozechner/pi-tui: Terminal UI components
